message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit high for me. How about we meet in the middle?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Bob, but I was really hoping we could do better than that. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $10,500?
Alice, I understand you're looking for a fair deal.  Would you be willing to consider $9,500? That's a significant step from my initial offer.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. How about we meet at $10,250?
Alice, this is a fair offer, but I'm on a tight budget.  Could you do $9,750? I'm hoping we can make this work.

I'm glad we're getting close, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $10,500, but I'll throw in a free additional feature that's worth $500?
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but the additional feature isn't that valuable to me.  How about we settle at $9,800? That's my final offer.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $10,000, Bob. That's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider other options.
